resources.string: Could not find any compatible camera apps on your device.
Unexpected error when trying to launch camera.
Camera permission required to capture picture.
Camera permission is required to take picture and extract colors.
Can I create my own wallpaper?

Yes! Chameleon provides first party support to Kustom Live Wallpaper Maker app. With KLWP, you can design your own theme and use colors extracted by Chameleon. Below formulas represent each color category. \n\nYou can quickly copy them by tapping on them.
